name: Steam Bandits: Outpost
blurb: A free-to-play steampunk/fantasy game in the sky! The first game in a series of interconnected games!

rewards.reward: No Reward
10 iocaine points (used to get virtual items in the game) \u25cf Access to backer forums, where you can discuss ideas with the devs
55 iocaine points \u25cf Access to backer forums, where you can discuss ideas with the devs
Exclusive in-game accessory (Overseer's Flight Goggles) \u25cf 125 iocaine points \u25cf Access to backer forums, where you can discuss ideas with the devs
EARLY BIRD REWARD: Everything from the $30 tier for only $20!  This is only available to the first 50 backers that pledge this amount.

Exclusive in-game outfit (Overseer's Flight Suit) \u25cf Steam Bandits desktop wallpaper \u25cf Get your name in the credits \u25cf Free copy of Iocaine's first game, ThreadSpace: Hyperbol (Immediate delivery of Steam code) \u25cf 450 iocaine points \u25cf All previous rewards (except iocaine points and limited rewards)
EARLY BIRD REWARD: Everything from the $50 tier for only $40!  This is only available to the first 30 backers that pledge this amount.

Exclusive in-game pet (Zephyr the Griffin) \u25cf Play the game up to 1 week before release to get a head start! \u25cf Access to the game\u2019s beta phase \u25cf Official soundtrack for Iocaine's first game, ThreadSpace: Hyperbol (Immediate digital delivery) \u25cf 1000 iocaine points \u25cf All previous rewards (except iocaine points and limited rewards)
EARLY BIRD REWARD: Everything from the $100 tier for only $80!  This is only available to the first 20 backers that pledge this amount.

Exclusive in-game outfit (Cicada Jetpack) \u25cf Name/design a Pet \u25cf Access to a backer-exclusive Captain \u25cf Priority access to our weekly Google Hangout meetings \u25cf 2,000 iocaine points \u25cf All previous rewards (except iocaine points and limited rewards)
[PHYSICAL ITEM] Steam Bandits signed poster \u25cf Everything from the $100 tier, INCLUDING prior physical items!  (Please add $15 for international shipping if not in the US)
EARLY BIRD REWARD: Everything from the $250 tier for only $200! This is only available to the first 15 backers that pledge this amount.

Your picture and name in our Wall of Fame, which will be accessible in-game \u25cf Name/design a Captain \u25cf 5,000 iocaine points \u25cf All previous rewards (except iocaine points and limited rewards)
[PHYSICAL ITEM] Steam Bandits t-shirt \u25cf Everything from the $250 tier, INCLUDING prior physical items!  (Please add $15 for international shipping if not in the US)

Access to future Steam Bandits games, including early designs, concept art, betas, AND a free copy of every future non-free-to-play Steam Bandits game! \u25cf 7,000 iocaine points \u25cf All previous rewards (except iocaine points and limited rewards)
[PHYSICAL ITEM] Steam Bandits Hoodie \u25cf Everything from the $350 tier, INCLUDING prior physical items! (Please add $15 for international shipping if not in the US)
EARLY BIRD REWARD: Everything from the $500 tier for only $400!  This is only available to the first 10 backers that pledge this amount.

Name/design an Airship \u25cf Decorative statue commemorating you in the game (visible on 'Backer Island') \u25cf 10,000 iocaine points \u25cf All previous rewards (except iocaine points and limited rewards)
[PHYSICAL ITEM] Signed art book \u25cf Everything from the $500 tier, INCLUDING prior physical items! (Please add $15 for international shipping if not in the US)
EARLY BIRD REWARD: Everything from the $1,000 tier for only $800!  This is only available to the first 5 backers that pledge this amount.

Name/Design an Island Template (shown when players buy an island) \u25cf Bigger statue compared to prior tiers \u25cf 20,000 iocaine points \u25cf All previous rewards (except iocaine points and limited rewards)
EARLY BIRD REWARD: Everything from the $2,000 tier for only $1,600!  This is only available to the first 5 backers that pledge this amount.

A town npc roamer modeled after your likeness and named after you (there will be a lot of towns with this character roaming around) \u25cf Bigger statue compared to prior tiers \u25cf 40,000 iocaine points \u25cf All previous rewards (except iocaine points) INCLUDING prior physical items!
EARLY BIRD REWARD: Everything from the $5,000 tier for only $3,500!  This is only available to the first 2 backers that pledge this amount.

Everything from prior tiers \u25cf One of the Backer Shop characters is named after you \u25cf Name a major merchant house (the world is filled with merchant families, but only a few major ones) \u25cf Join us for a pancake breakfast! (transportation not provided) \u25cf Larger statue compared to prior tier (largest backer pledge gets the biggest statue at the top of Backer Island!) \u25cf 100,000 iocaine points \u25cf All previous rewards (except iocaine points) INCLUDING prior physical items!
